answers.author: Philip Munck
answers.text:
Hi Harvey.  I just noticed your post.  Has it been resolved yet?  Each state has a specific process for  determining the structure of local government.  Typically, it either involves creation of a charter commission or selection of a canned plan found in state law.  The New York state association for municipalities is your best place to start your inquiry.

author: Harvey Geller
text: I live in New York State.  Our local town is currently governed by an elected Council.  Where can I get step by step information as to how to place a referencdum on the ballot to change the form of government to a Town Manager model?
title: Town Manager
